docs.snippet: THE resort industry in Nassau was still suffering from the crippling general strike late last week, but prospects for final settlement of the dispute, which shut down all of the Bahama island's hotels on Jan. 15, were brighter.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE resort industry in Nassau was still suffering from the crippling general strike late last week, but prospects for final settlement of the dispute, which shut down all of the Bahama island's hotels on Jan. 15, were brighter.

docs.snippet: HAVANA, Feb. 2 (AP) -- Fay Crocker of Uruguay, the 1955 United States open champion, today won Havana's 54-hole women's invitation golf tournament by defeating Mrs. Jackie Pung of San Francisco on the first extra hole after they had tied at 222.
docs.lead_paragraph: HAVANA, Feb. 2 (AP) -- Fay Crocker of Uruguay, the 1955 United States open champion, today won Havana's 54-hole women's invitation golf tournament by defeating Mrs. Jackie Pung of San Francisco on the first extra hole after they had tied at 222.

docs.lead_paragraph: THREE foreign leaders in humanity's struggle for political freedom have been chosen by Postmaster General Arthur E.
